text: Sandeep Michael (23 June 1981 - 23 November 2018) was an Indian field hockey player who played as a forward for the national team. Michael captained the National Junior team to Gold in the Asia Cup before being inducted into the Senior team. He was employed with Air India. Sandeep Michael died in the morning of 23 November 2018 in Bangalore after a brief illness, wherein he had slipped into a coma.Former India hockey player Sandeep Michael passes away at 33 after battle with neurological issues ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at bharatiyahockey.org Category:1981 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Field hockey players from Bangalore Category:Indian male field hockey players
title: Sandeep Michael
